name: Football Dash (endless runner)
description:
Over 1 million downloads! Now available on iOS!

Ever wanted to plow your way through massive amounts of football opponents to score touchdowns? Now's your chance in this endless football runner!

Experience fun hand drawn football characters, fluid animations, and easy one finger touch controls!

• Drag your finger (best with stylus) to move around the screen.
• Gather enough lightning to go into "Power Dash" football mode and run through your opponents.
• Score as many touchdowns as you can.
• See your top score against friends or the world in GooglePlay leaderboards.


Music credits:
• "Church Time" by ceehga
• "Urbana-Metronica (wooh-yeah mix)" by spinningmerkaba
